name: Searching for Memory
description:
WHERE THE MEMORY COULD BE YOUR ONLY CLUE

Im a student at ETIC_-Escola de Tecnologias Inovação e Criação, where this project was developed.

Searching for Memory is a videogame who tells the story of a boy (Afonso) searching for is missing grandfather (Zeca). Zeca has fought for his country in the Colonial War, and that left him with some traumas. Now Afonso is trying to find him and you will help him. 

In a game that gives you to know the portuguese area Alentejo.

I started to get my interest for creating videogames and 3D modelling in 2017. I was at EPI_-Escola Profissional de Imagem in Lisbon, in the course of Multimédia, where my final project was a short 3D animation. Since then Im looking to improve my skills has 3D Modeller.
